text: Bernardo Hernández de León (born 10 June 1993 in Cadereyta Jiménez, Nuevo León) is a Mexican footballer that players for Pacific on loan from CF Monterrey in Liga MX. He has represented Mexico at the 2013 CONCACAF U-20 Championship, 2013 FIFA U-20 World Cup and the 2014 Central American and Caribbean Games. ==Honours== ===International=== Mexico U-20 *CONCACAF U-20 Championship: ::Champion : 2013 Mexico U-23 *Central American and Caribbean Games: ::Champion : 2014 == References == Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican footballers Category:Mexico under-20 international footballers Category:Liga MX players Category:C.F.
